author: Staff Reporter
text:
A couple attempted suicide by consuming poison after submitting petitions at the grievances day redressal meeting at the Collectorate here on Monday.

Pandurangan (49), and his wife Malarkodi (45), of Karungalvadi in Tharamangalam submitted petitions to the officials. While leaving the hall, both swooned. They were admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital. Doctors said that both had consumed poison and were out of danger. Pandurangan said that he was residing in a house belonging to Kandasamy in Erode. Dispute prevailed between Kandasamy and his brother and a case was filed in the court. Kandasamy had asked Pandurangan to appear as witness. Since Pandurangan refused, Kandasamy took away his lorry and also locked the house. He demanded action against Kandasamy and also retrieval of his vehicle.
title: Couple attempts suicide
